page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN DARLINGTON
page.content:
This is survey on adults in this area who have told us about their jobs. MALE FEMALE PROFESSIONAL 1. Local Govt. 22 30 2. Civil Service 5 2 3. Self employed 11 15 MANUAL 1. Service Ind. 31 23 2. Manufacturing 65 3 UNEMPLOYED 1 16
In Adult Employment there are more males at work than females. There is only one male unemployed,which means only 17 adults are unemployed in this area.In this part of Darlington we are very lucky that we do not have as much unemployment as other parts of the country.
